sentences.sContent: A year of Chinese and foreign teaching recruitment will also have a short season, but no matter the season or the off-season every day there will be a new foreign teacher resources.
sentences.sContent_eng: A year of Chinese and foreign teaching recruitment will also have a short season, but no matter the season or the off-season every day there will be a new foreign teacher resources.
sentences.sCn: 招聘工作也会有淡旺季， 但是不管旺季还是淡季每天也都会有新的外教资源产生。

sentences.sContent: During the peak of recruiting season, you'll probably spend more time on the road than in your own bed, but during the off-season, you'll find yourself spending more time in the office.
sentences.sContent_eng: During the peak of recruiting season, you'll probably spend more time on the road than in your own bed, but during the off-season, you'll find yourself spending more time in the office.
sentences.sCn: 在求职季，你在路上的时间或许比休息的时间更多，但是求职季一过，你会在办公室工作更久。

trans.tranOther: the time of year when not many people are taking holidays
